Question.Subject: Mozilla Firefox problem.?
Question.Content: I have Mozilla Firefox as my default web browser. So sometimes when i go on the internet, i get this little message that says that 7 new add-ons were installed, and then my Speed Dial add-on is gone. Could someone maybe give me some insight to why this is happening? Please, and Thanks.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Read about problems in Firefox here
http://www.mozilla.org/security/known-vulnerabilities/
Report your problems to the people that make the software so they can fix it;-)

Answer.Content:

http://www.mozilla.org/security/known-vulnerabilities/
